availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William E. Ray (Marion Co, Ky, farmer and prov govt)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, farmer and provisional government convention member. Kentucky native. Farm hand in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861. Farmer in Marion County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 1, p. 582.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Marion County, KY, August 1863, p. 417, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "W.E. Ray (1837-1918)," Memorial #131754082 , http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/131754082 (accessed October 15, 2019).
KYR-0004-033-0001.
